title: Mckenna's mind matters: control stress (S)

description: Episode of Series "Paul McKenna's easy way to health & fitness". WARNING: THIS VIDEO SHOULD BE KEPT OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN AND PERSONS UNDER 18 YEARS OF AGE. THIS VIDEO SHOULD NOT BE WATCHED BY ANY PERSON WHO SUFFERS, OR MAY SUFFER FROM EPILEPSY, CLINICAL DEPRESSION, OR ANY OTHER NERVOUS OR PSYCHIATRIC CONDITION The Epilepsy Foundation of Victoria advises that this program contains outdated information, terminology and practices. The video "Control stress" will calm you down and preserve energy in order to reach goals. Using the latest techniques of personal enhancement, and hypnotic powers of trance to build up inner strength and peace.
